titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Undergraduate Athletic Association, Yale University, Meeting Minutes
Undergraduate Athletic Association, Yale University, Meeting Minutes
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:41

did.unittitle: Undergraduate Athletic Association, Yale University, meeting minutes

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of one bound volume of meeting minutes and supporting materials of the Undergraduate Athletic Association documenting athletics at Yale.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 38-A (YRG 38-A), Records documenting administration of Yale athletic and physical education programs.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the Department of Athletics, 2005.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Undergraduate Athletic Association, Yale University, Meeting Minutes (RU 1034). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Undergraduate Athletic Association was established in 1933. Members consisted of a president, secretary, and the captains and managers of Yale's athletic teams. Reporting to the Athletic Association Board of Control, the activities of the Undergraduate Athletic Association included the management of athletic competitions and the creation of awards and insignia. The functions of the Association were later taken over by the Department of Athletics Governing Board in 1967.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of one bound volume of meeting minutes and supporting materials of the Undergraduate Athletic Association documenting athletics at Yale.

did.unittitle: Meeting minutes of the Undergraduate Athletic Association
